backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko canister entry point defining an empty actor with no state or methods.
feature_evidence.json: Structured report listing implemented product features, affected frontend files, component dependencies, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Reference document mapping frontend file paths to concise human-written summaries of their responsibilities.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup defining design tokens, OKLCH color variables for light/dark themes, and base element styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that mounts the React app to #root and loads the Vite main.tsx module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that toggles between the intro narrative flow and the game view based on local state.
frontend/src/content/story.ts: Typed story data defining all intro narrative steps, including opening text, goal blocks, slider question, stat reveal, and Donald narrative blocks.
frontend/src/features/game/GameView.tsx: Canvas-based 2D game view rendering a Zelda-inspired scrolling terrain, controllable pixel-art character, and timed joke speech balloons using a deltaTime game loop.
frontend/src/features/game/jokes.ts: Exports a fixed array of five predefined jokes used during gameplay.
frontend/src/features/game/SpeechBalloon: UI component that renders an animated speech balloon positioned above the character while clamping within canvas bounds.
frontend/src/features/game/useGameLoop.t: Custom React hook that runs a requestAnimationFrame loop and provides frame-independent deltaTime updates.
frontend/src/features/game/useKeyboardCo: Custom React hook that tracks arrow-key movement state and triggers a callback on spacebar presses with proper event cleanup.
frontend/src/features/intro/GoalStickine: React component that asks a slider-based question, provides immediate feedback based on the selected percentage, and reveals a Continue button after a timed delay before calling onSubmit.
frontend/src/features/intro/introBackgro: Utility that computes a CSS linear-gradient string, interpolating from a light playful gradient to a darker, colder one based on progression through darkening steps.
frontend/src/features/intro/IntroFlow.ts: State-driven intro narrative flow that progressively reveals story text, buttons, and a slider question while transitioning background gradients based on darkening steps, and calls onComplete at the end.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches a backend actor using react-query, switching between anonymous and authenticated actors based on Internet Identity and invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context provider and hook that manage Internet Identity authentication state, login/logout actions, and AuthClient setup with persistence across reloads.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup defining design tokens via CSS variables for light and dark themes, base styles, fonts, and a few custom utility animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers and loads global styles.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling dark mode, plugins, container settings, and an extended theme that maps CSS variables to colors, radii, fonts, and animations.
